update house_deal

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},

right_type = #{rightType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pledge_info = #{pledgeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
